subject: RE: [junit] JUnit remote execution and TestDirector

Hi Mike,

Thanks for your mail.
EnhancedJUnit is really quite interesting adn I am going to=20
try it.

I still have problem to run JUnit tests from TestDirector 7.6.
The VAPI-XP tool does not work properly! If anyone managed to=20
use it for Java/Junit please tell me how!

Eric.



Enhanced JUnit uses remote test execution agents to run JUnit=20
tests
remotely. That is, it uses remote test execution agents to=20
distribute
JUnit tests to other machines and get back results.=20

The URL is: http://www.javatesting.com/Product/enhancedjunit/=20

Please feel free to contact me directly with technical=20
questions, as
I've had TD integration on my list of to-dos for a long time=20
and would
be happy to help.

- Mike=20

^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
Mike Silverstein=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0=A0
SilverMark, Inc.
The Object Testing Company
www.javatesting.com
